description: This file defines an error response function used to generate standardized JSON error responses for a Flask web application.

methods.name: error_response(status_code: int, code: str, message: str)
methods.description: Returns a JSON-formatted error response with a given status code, error code, and message.

ctags.name: error_response
ctags.pattern: /^def error_response(status_code: int, code: str, message: str):$/
